title: I Pitches
stimulusHtml:
16 points

Pitches (16 points)

  1. Award 1 point for each correctly notated pitch. Do not consider duration.

  2. Award full credit for octave transpositions of the correct bass pitch.

title: II Chord Symbols
stimulusHtml:
Chord Symbols (8 points)

  1. Award 1 point for each chord symbol correct in both Roman and Arabic numerals.

  2. Award 1/2 point for each correct Roman numeral that has incorrect or missing Arabic numerals.

  3. Accept the correct Roman numeral regardless of its case.

  4. Accept any symbol that means "of" or "applied" at Chord Three (e.g., V/iv, [V], V-- >iv, V of iv, etc.)

  5. Accept capital I for the Roman numeral of Chord Three.

title: III Special Scoring Issues
stimulusHtml:
Special Scoring Issues

Round any fractional score up to the next higher point. (Exception: round 23 DOWN.

0 Score for responses that represent an unsuccessful attempt to answer the question.
descriptions:
Special Scoring Issues

Round any fractional score up to the next higher point. (Exception: round 23 DOWN.

0 Score for responses that represent an unsuccessful attempt to answer the question.

title: IV Notes
stimulusHtml:
1. Disregard rhythms.

  2. Enharmonic equivalents will NOT be accepted.
descriptions:
1. Disregard rhythms.

  2. Enharmonic equivalents will NOT be accepted.
